Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing certain requirements for the dormitory prior to such authority issuing bonds and notes to finance certain projects
Summary: Relates to establishing certain requirements for the dormitory authority of the state of New York prior to such authority issuing bonds and notes to finance projects for a private institution or organization.
LawCode: Add ยง1678-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing certain requirements for the dormitory authority of the state of New York prior to such authority issuing bonds and notes to finance certain projects
